actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks or four Psychic Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Gythka
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Psychic Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Drain Vitality (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The thri-kreen targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 32 (5d12 damage) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The thri-kreen regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
